attributes.action: Do not pay the EU a further £1.7bn because we took harsh austerity measures.
attributes.additional_details:
I find it truly disgusting that the EU believe that we the UK should further fund their ever increasing over exaggerated budget.

If the government pays the additional £1.7bn in Decemeber because we have taken strict austerity measures, then you will be fuelling the fire even more for the people wanting to leave the EU.

They are seen as a group of lazy money grabbing incompetent politicians that have no interest in providing a stable enconomy.

The UK government must reject the EUs call for additional financing and concentrate on lowering our deficit and increasing our peoples way of living and not supporting weak foreign economies with corrupt governments.
